medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.

inscribed:
In black ink, verso, lower right: [on an applied piece of paper]: 52 AD
In graphite, verso, lower left: 76

texts.remarks: As per Giada Damen, IMLS Drawings 2018-2020
